thread.title: Donald Trump supporters officially have the worst spelling / grammar on Facebook
thread.title_full: WTF | Donald Trump supporters officially have the worst spelling / grammar on Facebook - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Donald Trump supporters officially have the worst spelling / grammar on Facebook
text:
This may not come as shock to some people, but it's pretty conclusive - Donald Trump supporters are dumbasses.
Proofreading company Grammarly analysed the Facebook comments of the nineteen Presidential candidates and discovered more than a few startling and frankly completely believable facts.
The survey found that Republican supporters made far more mistakes than Democrats and that Republican supporters use fewer unique words than Democrats. There's more - far and away, Donald Trump supporters made the most mistakes of all candidates.
Out of every 100 words, Trump supporters made at least twelve mistakes compared to Bernie Sanders supporters who make just three mistakes per 100 words.
The study by Grammarly was pretty rigorous, with the algorithm analysing comments from candidates' Facebook pages from April to August of this year, with the analysed comments then checked by actual proofreaders.
Here's the infographic in full.
Via Grammarly
